title: ICE building protobuf-json-0.1.0, Rust 1.16 beta

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

body:
https://github.com/mrjones/rust-protobuf-json 5dbb6be3e4fed92ede0c5ddc9e5a0560ef27e0f8

```
brian@ip-10-145-43-250:/mnt2/dev⟫ rustc +beta -Vv
rustc 1.16.0-beta.1 (5276ba72e 2017-01-31)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 5276ba72e8fe13597200254447fce9cb3783c583
commit-date: 2017-01-31
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.16.0-beta.1
LLVM version: 3.9
```

cc @mrjones
